SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name,rownum as num FROM (SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name FROM car WHERE car_fueltype LIKE '%전기%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%수소%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%LPG%'))A WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/9.0) FROM (SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name FROM car WHERE car_fueltype LIKE '%전기%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%수소%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%LPG%')

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name,rownum as num FROM (SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name FROM car WHERE car_fueltype LIKE '%전기%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%수소%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%LPG%' ORDER BY car_launchdate DESC))A WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT A.* FROM(SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name,rownum as num,comprice FROM (SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name, TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(price,',','')) AS comprice FROM (SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name,(CASE WHEN car_price ='미정' THEN '0' WHEN car_price LIKE '%~%' THEN SUBSTR(car_price,0,INSTR(car_price,' ',1,1)-1) else car_price END) AS price FROM car) WHERE car_fueltype LIKE '%전기%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%수소%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%LPG%' ORDER BY comprice DESC))A WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name FROM car WHERE car_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND (car_fueltype LIKE '%전기%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%수소%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%LPG%')

SELECT A.* FROM(SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name,lowPrice,highPrice,rownum as num FROM(SELECT car_num,car_name,car_poster,car_price,car_launchdate,car_efficiency,car_size,car_fueltype,brand_name, TO_NUMBER(REPLACE((CASE WHEN car_price='미정' THEN '0' WHEN car_price LIKE '%~%' THEN SUBSTR(car_price,0,INSTR(car_price,' ',1,1)-1) else car_price END),',','')) as lowPrice, TO_NUMBER(REPLACE((CASE WHEN car_price='미정' THEN '0' WHEN car_price LIKE '%~%' THEN SUBSTR(car_price,INSTR(car_price,' ',1,2)+1) else car_price END),',','')) as highPrice FROM car WHERE car_fueltype LIKE '%전기%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%수소%' OR car_fueltype LIKE '%LPG%' ORDER BY lowPrice DESC))A WHERE #{lowPrice} <= lowPrice AND highPrice <= #{highPrice}
